segments.speaker: A
segments.text: We've started something really exciting and we want you to be the first to know about it.

segments.speaker: B
segments.text: It's all about creativity, innovation and helping creators to do their best work faster, better and easier.

segments.speaker: A
segments.text: But first, a bit of history. We both cut our teeth in TV and visual effects and then found ourselves in the world of elearning. It's there at a company called Circus street that we were able to collaborate, argue, bounce ideas off each other for over a decade.

segments.speaker: B
segments.text: At, uh, Circus street, our real advantage was creativity. While our competitors were just ticking boxes, we were building something different, a product driven by innovation, quality and genuine creativity. That's what set us apart.

segments.speaker: A
segments.text: Experience, insight, shared passion led us to Nice Touch, a new chapter dedicated entirely to empowering creators like never before.

segments.speaker: A
segments.text: Introducing Nice Touch. We're calling it the operating system for Creators.

segments.speaker: B
segments.text: Not an actual os, but a smart, intuitive set of tools that streamline your existing creative processes.

segments.speaker: A
segments.text: This means smoother workflows, fewer disruptions, more opportunities to create amazing work, leading to better projects, more gigs, and more income for creators.

segments.speaker: A
segments.text: We're not trying to automate creativity itself. We want to take away the mundane tasks that hold you back.

segments.speaker: B
segments.text: Every creator understands the frustration of losing valuable hours to repetitive tasks, things like checking exports, organizing files, chasing feedback. We want to remove those barriers, helping you to spend more time doing what you genuinely love creating.

segments.speaker: B
segments.text: So we're at the start of this journey and we need you.

segments.speaker: B
segments.text: So whether it's just a chat or you want to see what we're up to or get involved somehow, let's do this.

segments.speaker: A
segments.text: Go sign up on the site, it's nicetouch app. Come chat with us on Discord. I'll put the link in the description. We're online most days

segments.speaker: B
segments.text: Got our numbers, just give us a call or drop us a message.

segments.speaker: A
segments.text: This is just the beginning. Who knows where we'll end up, but it's going to be big.
